mapper.select: select from tb_category where userId = #{userId} and id = #{id} and status = '1'
select c.id,c.name,c.description,c.createTime,c.modifyTime from tb_category c,tb_systemCategory sc where c.userId = #{userId} and c.status = '1'
select count(*) from tb_category where userId = #{userId} and status = '1'
mapper.delete: delete from tb_category where userId = #{userId} and id = #{id} and status = '1'
mapper.update: update tb_category set description = #{description },name = #{name} where userId = #{userId} and id = #{id} and status = '1'
